meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Julie Harris Neiger Jim Tigrak David McCutchen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1115.

td.p: Julie Harris Neiger, a teacher from San Diego, California
Jim Tigrak, an aerospace engineer originally from Champaign, Illinois
David McCutchen, an inventor & filmmaker originally from Santa Barbara, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $8,201)

tr.td: POP MUSIC
RELIGION
ALASKA
TRIVIA
CELEBRITY SPELLING
